import React from 'react'; import Navbar from '../components/widgets/Navbar'; const mainImage={ width: '75%', height: 'auto', display: 'block', marginLeft: 'auto', marginRight: 'auto', marginTop: '3vw', marginBottom: '3vw', } const roleRow={ display: 'flex', fontSize: '14px', color: '#4d4d4d', } class FBUCodepath extends React.Component{ render(){ return(
Overview: This summer, I had the opportunity to mentor at the Facebook University for Engineering as a Tutor for Android Development. Under the Codepath cohort, we led an Android Development bootcamp for the first three weeks of the FBU program.
Role:
Tools:
Date:
Preparation: The goal of the Codepath bootcamp was for the interns to feel accustomed to Android Development and empower them to create their own applications. In preparation of our mentorship position, the tutors created four applications on Android Studio:
  • Instagram:

  • Twitter:

  • Flixster:

  • Simple To-Do App:

Outcome:
); } } export default FBUCodepath;
